pages.text: est this magic vi ne seg
Sufer brul Vi est pacient impatient gxi est des sam por vi! This est just requital ki vi did
Ili gxu ki their Lord rezerv them; their Lord sxpar them retribution Infer
Mangx trink happily dors your works
Ili relax luxurious furnishings ni alumet them bel spouses
Por those kred their infan ankaux sekv them belief ni hav their infan join them! Ni neniam fail rekompenc them any work Cxiu ul est pag por ki li did
Ni supply them frukt viand ili am
Ili gxu drink neniam polluted neniam sinful trink
Serv them est servants protekt perl
Ili meet each ali reminisce themselves
Ili dir Ni uz est kind humil our popol
DI BEN us SXPAR us AGONDI ill VUND
Ni uz implore Him; Li est plej Kind Merciful
Vi remind popol. Kun your Lord's ben vi vi est nek soothsayer nor crazy
Ili dir Li est poet; just wait gxis li est dead
Dir Ir sur waiting mi wait vi
